settings.shipping:
Jones Road currently ships throughout the US, Canada, UK (including England, Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland, excluding Crown Dependencies), Australia, New Zealand, and EU (Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovak Republic, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden)

US: Free standard shipping for orders over $85. For orders under $85, shipping is $6.95.

Canada: Free standard shipping for orders over $125 CAD. For orders under $125 CAD, shipping is $13 CAD.

UK: Free standard shipping for orders over £75 GBP. For orders under £75 GBP, shipping is calculated at checkout.

EU: Free standard shipping for orders over €85 EUR. For orders under €85 EUR, shipping is €7 EUR in Germany, France, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Netherlands, Portugal, Belgium, Austria, Finland, Luxembourg. For orders under €85 EUR, shipping is €9 EUR in Croatia, Cyprus, Malta, Latvia, Lithuania, Slovenia and Slovak Republic.

Australia: Free standard shipping for orders over A$150. For orders under A$150, shipping is A$15.

New Zealand: Free standard shipping for orders over NZ$165. For orders under NZ$165, shipping is NZ$15.

For Canada orders over $125 CAD, any applicable duties or import taxes will be collected at checkout.

For UK orders over £135, any applicable duties or import taxes will be collected at checkout.

For EU orders, any applicable duties or import taxes are included in the pricing. No additional fees will be incurred upon delivery.

For Australia & New Zealand orders, any applicable duties or import taxes are included in pricing.

Orders are processed Monday - Friday, with the exception of US holidays. Orders are typically fulfilled and shipped within 3-4 business days. Once your order has shipped, you’ll receive an email from hi@jonesroadbeauty.com with tracking information.
settings.returns:
To request a return or exchange, please visit https://returns.jonesroadbeauty.com and follow the steps provided. Kindly note that we will process your request as soon as possible. In the EU, for returns and exchanges over €140 EUR, a €6.95 restocking fee will apply.

For gift returns:
To process a return or exchange for product(s) received as a gift, please head to the Jones Road beauty Returns and Exchanges Portal. Enter the order number and associated shipping zip code associated. In the EU, for returns and exchanges over €140 EUR, a €6.95 restocking fee will apply.
